So why is it then that Canadians turn the other cheek and Americans get angry??I'll tell you why...because Canadians don't judge an entire nation based on the actions of a few idiots that boo at a hockey game or some uneducated military person who doesn't know the difference between rightside up and upside down or because a bunch of dykes on skates decide to stomp on Canada's flag. There are 25O million Americans and the actions of a few fools doesn't effect the way we feel about you guys...we like you...believe it or not. Remember my American cousins, just cause a few eggheads boo God Bless America, it doesn't mean that all 35 million of us feel the same way as a scant few do.

Whoever said "when they start to boo when I am catching a walleye, I will pay attention" had it right. Or I guess if there is an overwhelming majority, which obviously there is not.
